R7PE01
Punch Out

invincibility [wiiztec]
C201148C 00000003
2C05000B 41800008
4E800020 9421FF70
60000000 00000000
opponents punches go right through you

neither mac nor his opponent will flinch [wiiztec]
040116F8 38800001
the notes for the 2 codes below apply

mac doesn't flinch [wiiztec]
C2019AA4 00000005
3D808038 618C4CA8
818C0000 7C0C1800
40820010 2C042000
40820008 38800001
90830008 00000000
you will be able to counterattack immediately after getting hit

opponent doesn't flinch [wiiztec]
C2019AA4 00000005
3D808042 618C7510
7C0C5800 40820010
2C042000 40820008
38800001 90830008
60000000 00000000
you won't be able to get as many punches in before they block again

get tired after getting hit once [wiiztec]
04011C30 60000000

Turn Off Red Flash from Opponents (A+Upward=Flash Off,A+Downward=Normal) [g6flavor]
283A50A2 00000802
04099AF8 60000000
E0000000 80008000
283A50A2 00000801
04099AF8 901D0218
E0000000 80008000

* Round 1 only

** All button codes are done on a Wii Remote only (side way)

Time Codes:

Slow down timer to match Actual time speed [g6flavor]

283C6DE2 000038D4
48000000 8039D420
DE000000 80008180

E0000000 80008000

Profile 1 Codes:

Unlock Headgear (push B+1) [g6flavor]
283A50A2 00000600
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
10000EE7 00000001
E0000000 80008000

283A50A2 00000A00
48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
100002B3 00000003
E0000000 80008000

48000000 80412BD0
DE000000 80008180
10000E5F 00000001
E0000000 80008000
